name: Delta One Suites on the A350, Atlanta - Los Angeles
description:
Delta's Airbus A350 with their swanky Delta One Suites is the star of the show today. I've had three failed attempts to fly this beautiful product, thanks to two equipment changes and a pandemic....but in April I finally succeeded in test driving one of the USA's best business class seats. How does it measure up...? Watch to find out.

0:00 Introduction
1:49 Sandwich shopping
2:29 Delta Sky Club @ ATL, F Concourse
3:25 Face to face with our Delta A350-900
4:29 Boarding the A350
4:56 Delta One Suites in the forward cabin
6:12 Taxi and take off
7:28 Seat (suite?) tour
9:34 Delta's cringey catering offer...
11:36 In flight entertainment and wifi
12:08 Bathroom views
12:19 Bed mode
12:46 Conclusions, fare paid (ouch), and thanks/goodbye!

Route: ATL-LAX
Aircraft: Airbus A350-900
Flight Number: DL 383
Miles: 1,942
Airborne time: 4h20m
